QuestData.Title: Nana's Vote II: The Sacred Springs
QuestData.Description: You caught me at a good time, $n. I was just hankering to make a fresh batch of Witchberry Julep.$B$BHave you ever heard of this wondrous brew?$B$BEach sip takes ten years off your face! How do you think I still look so good?$B$BAnyway, I need a special ingredient - thousand-year water - which can be collected from the mouth of the waterfall to the north.$B$BI'm afraid the journey is too treacherous for an old matron like me, but if you can get your hands on a pitcher, I'll let you share my brew.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Empty Pitcher at the Golden Falls to collect Thousand-Year Water.
